name: First Door Demo
description:
Hi

This game is demo for my project, you play as "Bug" , help our little friend grab key to open the Door.

Thanks to Kenney for the assets and Yuji Oshimoto for the font

Control :

  • Up Arrow / W = Jump
  • Right Arrow / D = Move Right
  • Left Arrow / A = Move Left
  • R = Reset Current Scene
  • E = Zoom Out
  • Q = Zoom In

If you cannot run this game , please leave a comment
